name: Rock Paper Scissors Champion
description: In this game, you must regain your Rock Paper Scissors Crown by defeating the three members of the Triple R Gang: Rocky, Randy and Ripley. They all have their own unique play styles. When you throw three identical moves in a row you unleash a combo!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

reviews.review_text: Don't.
Not sure why this is even a game..  Literally, takes only a couple minutes to win. You can only win by randomly guessing which to choose.. Do not download this. Waste of time..
Thanks to this game I'm now able to win against my friends in Rock Paper Scissors. Good Game ðŸ’ª

I thought no one could possibly ruin rock paper scissors but they did.
One of the most challenging games of the year! Decent Graphics, Catchy Music, Responsive Controls, In-Depth Story, what else do you need in a video game!
Best Opening intro ever  And you might need psychological evalutaion if you play more than 30 min and enjoyed the game.

Beautiful. Has changed my life. JUST KIDDING ITS BAD

is this the game that this century has been waiting for directed by miuchaela bay and rock star games presents rock paper scissors champion  set in the very near future of 5660 AD, where the world is ruled by intense dota 2 players, some bloke whose name is unknown challenges the 3 government head leaders to a time-limited, permadeath, 1 hit kill mario kart race on ds. the game imbues hardcore action skills into its amazing space-themed atmosphere, i tried atleast 53 times to beat the 1st level (-5 levels in total) and so far i havent beaten it yet. one day i hope to achieve a win on this game but for now i think ill just stick with playing grand call of duty auto: vice city 5 and watching bee movie  ok the game was amazing probably better than any rts or strategy game ive ever played in my life definate keep worth atleast $30

Would recomend if you want to play someting stupid for literally 30 seconds. It took me that long to beat it. I used the rest of my time (4 minutes about) to put hotdogs in the microwave, take a â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥, wash my hands, and then eat the hot-dogs at their most optimal temperature. If your goal is to find something to do while you wait on hotdogs to become perfectly edible, and or you have to take a â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥, this is the game of you.
Great story, fun gameplay, what more could you ask for?  8/10 Needs more water.  Just kidding, 10/10

i downloaded this game as a goof, now i really just want to throw a pinecone into the air and use sissors to slash it into oblivion.

This game is, in two words, utter â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥. Despite being completely free, it costs too much. I almost wish it did cost something so I could be more upset about it, but if it did I probably would have gone insane and murdered several people by now.  10/10, would recommend downloading before it's inevetably removed from steam.

Crap game. Superpowers (pick the same thing 3x in a row to use) are rockwall which defends you against 1hp of damage, scissor attack thing which does 1hp damage (i think), papermind which shows you what your opponent will pick for the next turn.  That is the entire game in a nutshell.  Play only if you want to practice playing rock paper scissors strategically, and also if you don't like yourself/want to listen to annoying sounds and look at â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥ graphics.

This game changed my life. It is art. The soundtrack made me tear up to the point that i was questioning my own existance. I would recommend this to anyone and the fact its free showed genorocity in the human race.
